channel.title: General on Jaisu's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in General on Jaisu's Blog

item.title: Why Blog?
item.description: Why Blog? Starting a blog is a very uncharacteristic step for someone like me who’s very judgemental about any attempts at self-marketing. Then why do it? Precisely for that reason. Simply put, I want to record my lessons and projects by documenting them publicly, open to criticism and review by everyone. I think this is the best way to learn and challenge my own brain to become better at being public with my work.
